# Government Tender Announcement

## Reference Information

* **Reference Number**: WS4096186317-Doc4610386593
* **Amended on**: 2024-07-05
* **Closing Date**: 2024-07-29 14:00:00

## Solicitation Details

* **Solicitation Title**: 21170-231084
* **Type of Solicitation**: Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)
* **Clasification Code**: 53100000 (Clothing)
* **Expiry Date**: 2024-07-29, ( although the explanatory note says this tender is already **Expired**, this is still included for clarity)
* **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec (except National Capital Region)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Original Closing Date**: 2024-07-29 ( extended when archived tender)

## End User Details

* **End User Entity**: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC)
* **End User Address**: 340 Laurier Ave W, Ottawa, Ontario, Canada K1P 0P9
* **Contact Information**: None ( email: [Swanson, Manon (SPAC/PSPC) at manon.swanson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:manon.swanson@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca))

## Description of Requirement:

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is seeking a Standing Offer for the provision of dual threat soft body armour, to be worn by Correctional Officers (CO), Primary Workers (PW), and Correctional Training Instructors while they perform their daily duties. The body armour will be individually fitted and issued. It will be delivered to Laval, Quebec. The procurement of the dual threat vest with option years integrated into the standing offer was designed for 1 year, plus any 1 four-year extensions, with an initial year of 2023 and 4 renewal options thereafter. The CSC anticipates the procurement of the dual-threat vest within the next year, which should make the expiry date irrelevant. (optional)
*Note: While archived tenders may still be available, the deadline is for informational purposes and procurement may occur closer to the anticipated start date.*
